mapper.update: update lg_cargodetails set predictedQuantity = #{predictedquantity,jdbcType=INTEGER}, predictedVolume = #{predictedvolume,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, predictedWeight = #{predictedweight,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, originGoodsId = #{origingoodsid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, arrivalGoodsId = #{arrivalgoodsid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, deliveryMode = #{deliverymode,jdbcType=INTEGER}, accountingCost = #{accountingcost,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, receiptPerson = #{receiptperson,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remarks1 = #{remarks1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remarks2 = #{remarks2,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where cargoDetailsId = #{cargodetailsid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select cargoDetailsId, predictedQuantity, predictedVolume, predictedWeight, originGoodsId, arrivalGoodsId, deliveryMode, accountingCost, receiptPerson, remarks1, remarks2 from lg_cargodetails where cargoDetailsId = #{cargodetailsid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select cargoDetailsId, predictedQuantity, predictedVolume, predictedWeight, originGoodsId, arrivalGoodsId, deliveryMode, accountingCost, receiptPerson, remarks1, remarks2 from lg_cargodetails
